biotools.summary: FABRIC Cancer Portal is a comprehensive catalogue of human coding genes in cancer based on the FABRIC framework. FABRIC quantifies the selection of genes in tumor and weighs their evidence for being cancer drivers.

bioschemas.name: FABRIC Cancer Portal
bioschemas.summary: FABRIC Cancer Portal is a comprehensive catalogue of human coding genes in cancer based on the FABRIC framework. FABRIC quantifies the selection of genes in tumor and weighs their evidence for being cancer drivers.
